titleStmt.title: The Catholiques plea, or An explanation of the Roman Catholick belief. Concerning their [brace] church, manner of worship, justification, civill governement. : Together with a catalogue of all the pœnall statutes against popish recusants. : All which is humbly submitted to serious consideration. / By a Catholick gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Birchley, William, 1613-1669.

titleStmt.title: The Catholiques plea, or An explanation of the Roman Catholick belief. Concerning their [brace] church, manner of worship, justification, civill governement. : Together with a catalogue of all the pœnall statutes against popish recusants. : All which is humbly submitted to serious consideration. / By a Catholick gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Birchley, William, 1613-1669.

notesStmt.note: "Postscript" signed: Will. Birchley [pseud. of John Austin]
Date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: stained and tightly bound, with loss of text; p. 79 lacking from film.
Item at 2662:4 is replacement for incomplete copy at 2281:30.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
